bug.author: aaronmarkham
bug.summary: [ci] [docs] Error blocking all PRs: autodocsumm is incompatible with Sphinx 2.4.0
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
CI and website builds are down due to an incompatibility in versions of Sphinx and one of its extensions, autodocsumm. This extension is used in the Python API docs (fairly important feature). Also, reported here on the autodocsumm project as of yesterday. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Chilipp/autodocsumm/issues/22>Chilipp/autodocsumm#22</denchmark-link>
I already have a proposed fix coming... <denchmark-h:h3>Error Message</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:http://jenkins.mxnet-ci.amazon-ml.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/mxnet-validation%2Fwebsite/detail/PR-17489/4/pipeline/>http://jenkins.mxnet-ci.amazon-ml.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/mxnet-validation%2Fwebsite/detail/PR-17489/4/pipeline/</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>[2020-02-10T21:06:01.468Z] Extension error: [2020-02-10T21:06:01.468Z] Could not import extension autodocsumm (exception: cannot import name 'Signature' from 'sphinx.ext.autodoc' (unknown location)) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Just build python docs.
